title: Fabrika de Typos
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001000/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001000/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Fabrica de Typos**

[Brazilian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001000/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Brazil) type foundry run by [Marcio Hirosse](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001000/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Marcio%20Hirosse) in [São Paulo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001000/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sao%20Paulo).
